title: aNiattiDum tAi
sahitya:
aNaittiDum tAi nI anrO enrum ambuja malar urai annaiyE ennaiyE


anupallavi

  iNaiyilA amudena inikkum un nAmattai ishaittu ishaittup-paNNAl irainji azhaikkum ennai


caraNam    muruval oLirndiDum pavazha vAi tirandu paraman padam tara parinduraittu nI
 aruL vizhiyAl en iruvinai tIrttu piravip-piNi aghaTrik-karakkamalam nITTi
